title: Visa doesnt work!
body: So I was just looking forward to buying some skins on sale.. I went to the bank and got 20 euros on my Visa account. I come home and I go on LoL. The next thing I see when I press pay.. Is ERROR! Im more than 200% sure that I did everything right. Ive done this for 1 year now... with no fails. I went to the bank and everything was OK. Please help, thanks in advance!{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:1}} Im from SLOVENIA.. if maybe thats a problem.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for such a late reply.

Are you still experiencing this issue?
